@graph.name: Digital Credibility Score Audit | NexTara AI Solutions
@graph.description: Request a Digital Credibility Score Audit to understand whether your current website can realistically reach a DCS 900+ standard.

@graph.name: Digital Credibility Score Audit
@graph.description: A governance-grade diagnostic that evaluates your website across five pillars of the Digital Credibility Score framework.

mainEntity.name: Is this just an SEO audit with a different label?

acceptedAnswer.text: No. A DCS Audit includes SEO and schema, but it also evaluates conversion, trust, analytics, and governance.

mainEntity.name: Can my current agency or developer use this audit?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. The audit is vendor-neutral. You keep the score, the findings, and the documentation.

mainEntity.name: What if my score is already high?

acceptedAnswer.text: The audit focuses on unlocking specific opportunities: AI visibility, conversion lift, and governance hardening.

mainEntity.name: Will you try to sell me a full website rebuild?

acceptedAnswer.text: Only if the data justifies it. The DCS Audit is designed to answer: Can this website realistically operate as a DCS 900+ asset?
